name: Gorgoth
title: The Devourer
renown: a massive dragon-like creature that feeds on anything in its path

name: Zalazar
title: The Lich King
renown: a powerful undead sorcerer who commands an army of zombies and skeletons

name: Kira
title: The Banshee Queen
renown: a spectral woman who can shatter the minds of her foes with her piercing scream

name: Raxus
title: The Bloodthirsty
renown: a savage orc warlord who leads a horde of brutal warriors

name: Nixia
title: The Shadow Weaver
renown: a mysterious spider-like being who can manipulate darkness and illusions
